items.name: Eureka!
items.details: Combining the smoothness Jim Beam, a dash of Sweet & Sour with Pinneaple flavour, a pinch of Egg White, donned with the seduction of Red Wine!

items.name: Blood Moon
items.details: A cocktail that brings out ravishing red conjured up with the combo of Beetroot, Carrot, and Cinnamon, topped with essence of Lime.

items.name: A Space Odyssey
items.details: UnEarth the undiscovered truths of the universe with a cocktail made of Triple Sec, Orange Juice, Turmeric, and Chilli Salt Trim.

items.name: Stardust
items.details: We recreate the cosmos in your cocktail with Vodka, fresh Strawberry, Betal Leaves, Sweet & Sour, and Candy Flower.

items.name: Footprints on the Moon
items.details: Thi Crazy cocktail made with Vodka, Red Wine, Basil Leaves, Sweet & Sour, Basil Syrup, Clove, and Coke might leave you feeling higher than you've ever been!

items.name: Ale the way to Space!
items.details: The perfect cocktail made with the magical portion of Jack Daniels, Lime Juice, Ginger Ale, Triple Sec, and Ginger is here to let that trippy feeling kick in.

items.name: Dark Matter
items.details: This one's as dark as the beginning of the Big Bang! All beautiful and chaotic blended with Bacardi, Kala Khatta Syrup, Sweet & Sour, and some Coke.

items.name: Axistence
items.details: Orbiting in our axis of daily life gets pretty mundane. So, shake it up with a cocktail that is made of a dramatic mix of Vodka, Sweet & Sour, Fresh Ginger, and Lemongrass.

items.name: Lime Space Continuum
items.details: And all the banter gets even more interesting with a crazy cocktail created with the magic of Gin, Martini Rosso, Kafir Lime, Lime Juice, and Sugar.

items.name: Sunsational
items.details: A rich yellow that gives you a high so mellow; made with the right proportions of Bacardi, Ripe Banana, Pinneapple Juice, Banana Juice Puree, and Cardamom Powder.

items.name: The Big Bang Theory
items.details: It all started with a big bang of Gin, Earl Grey Tea, Honey, and Lavender Syrup. The truth of the universe is concentrated in this ecstatic cocktail!

items.name: Ginesis
items.details: Truly oriGINal in it taste, this cocktail made with Gin, Rasberry, Sweet & Sour, and Egg White establishes a state of pure bliss and cultivates a following of its own.

items.name: Rocketful of Sunshine
items.details: Your all time favourite MOJITO made with the goodness of Bacardi, Mint Leaves, Lemon Chunks, Brown Sugar, Lime Juice, Soda, Sprite, and Monin Mint Syrup.

items.name: Plutonic Love
items.details: The classic OLD-FASHIONED cocktail you can always go back to back; made with Jim Beam, Orange Peel, Angostura Bitters, and White Sugar.

items.name: Marsgarita
items.details: The porpular MARGARITA always stealing the show; made with Tequila, Triple Sec, and Lime Juice.

items.name: The Big Bang
items.details: All the fun starts here with the WHISKEY SOUR, made with Jim Beam, Egg White, and Sweet & Sour.

items.name: Bloody Marry-Go-Round
items.details: Get tipsy when your BLOODY MARY made of Vodka, Tomato Juice, Celery Salt, Worcestershiresauce, Tabasco, and Black Pepper unleashes the thrill!

items.name: Cosmospolitan
items.details: When Vodka, Triple Sec, Cranberry Juice, and Lime Juice come together, you experience the entire cosmos in a drink!

items.name: Stargasm
items.details: Your SEX-ON-THE-BEACH is only more rewarding when in space; made with Vodka, Peach Syrup, Lime Juice, Orange Juice, and Cranberry Juice.

items.name: Ball of Fire
items.details: That craxy MELON BALL never stops to enthral; made with Vodka, Midori, Orange Juice, and Pinneapple Juice.

items.name: The God Particle
items.details: Never gets old, RED WINE SANGRIA!

items.name: Paradise Restored
items.details: WHITE WINE SANGRIA to restore your faith in the brewniverse!

items.name: LIIT YEARS AHEAD
items.description: This legend never runs out of greatness and is conjured up with the right mix of Barcadi, Gin, Vodka, Tequila, Triple Sec, Sweet and Sour, and Coke!
We've managed to capture the meaning of life in our cocktail. This beaut is made of Barcadi, Gin, Vodka, Tequila, Sweet and Sour, Green Tea, Honey, and Red Bull.

items.name: SMOOTH & EARTHISTIC
items.description: The perfect antidote to despair is right here made with hope and sunshine along with a little bit of Vodka, Gin, Bacardi, Tequila, Passion Fruit, and Banana Puree.

items.name: GRAWITTY
items.description: The grandmaster is witty and has carefully sealed the answers of the universe in this drink made with Vodka, Bacardi, Gin, Tequila, Cinnamon Syrup, Captain Morgan, and Tea.

items.name: Jager Bomb
items.details: Jagermeister, Red Bull

items.name: Jelly Fish
items.details: Grenadine, Sambuca, Baileys, Blue Curacao

items.name: Flaming Bomb Marly
items.details: Grenadine, Bacardi, Cream De Menthe, Banana Liquor

items.name: Sliperry Nippel
items.details: Sambuca, Baileys, Cherry

items.name: Blow Job
items.details: Amaeretto, Kahlija, Baileys, Whipped

items.name: WHY SO SIRIUS?
items.details: Named after a star system, this is your favourite Apple Cinnamon Mojito made with fresh Mint, fresh Lemon chunks, Lime juice, Mint Syrup, and Cinnamon.

items.name: JEDI HIGH COUNCIL
items.details: Keeping a check on your saas with this tasteful drink made with fresh Apple chunks, Basil leaves, Chaat Masala, Apple Juice, Lime Juice, and Basil Syrup.

items.name: YODA-LICIOUS!
items.details: Give wisdom a chance! Lemon Juice, Beetroot, Chaat Masala, Black Salt, and Sugar make it happen.

items.name: GUIDE TO THE GALAXY #101
items.details: Fresh Carrots, Orange Juice, Orange Crush, and Soda blend together to take you on a trip to the universe!

items.name: STRING THEORY
items.details: This one looks beautiful with a complex miz of colors; made with fresh Watermelon, Orange Chunks, Chaat Masala, fresh Mint, Sweet and Sour, Orange Juice, and Watermelon Syrup.

items.name: DELTA OF VENUS
items.details: Instantly fall in love with this one; made with fresh Orange chunks, Pomegranate Seeds, Chaat Masala, and Sprite!
